sparklers.name: Sparklers
sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

snakes.name: Snakes
snakes.description: The packaging makes these sound way more exciting than they actually are.

arial.name: Arial
arial.description: Launches up into the sky and makes crowds go 'ahhh'.

hoop 'o' flame.name: Hoop 'o' Flame
hoop 'o' flame.description: Its big, it spins, its way too big to fire off in your driveway without setting the house on fire.

the trump.name: The Trump
the trump.description: This fearsome visage looks down at assembled crowds of revelers, or enemies.

m-1000.name: M-1000
m-1000.description: Celebrate the independence of your country by blowing up a small part of it!

mega flower.name: Mega Flower
mega flower.description: 20x the size of those puny flowers.  These were all the rage in the 50's before safety became a concern.

imperial roman candle.name: Imperial Roman Candle
imperial roman candle.description: If youre going to launch this at your friends, make sure they are wearing armor.

tannerite.name: Tannerite
tannerite.description: Fun stuff to bring with you to the shooting range.  Disclaimer: Purchasers may wind up on a Homeland Security watch list.

thermite.name: Thermite
thermite.description: Did you know this stuff was legal?  We didnt either.

blasting caps.name: Blasting Caps
blasting caps.description: Farmers can buy these, why cant you?

semtex.name: Semtex
semtex.description: When that run down casino just wont budge.

emugel.name: Emugel
emugel.description: Perfect for quarry blasting.  Just pray you dont unearth any troggs while doing so.

c-4.name: C-4
c-4.description: Choice explosive among SEAL Team-6 operatives.

daisy cutter.name: Daisy Cutter
daisy cutter.description: You wont be cutting any daisies with this puppy.

melta bomb.name: Melta Bomb
melta bomb.description: Destroy those pesky armored targets and do so in the name of The Emperor!
